long_description: Spenco PolySorb ProForm replacement insoles deliver thin, contoured and flexible support for increased shock absorption and heel strike protection underfoot. Topsheet features 4-way stretch fabric to reduce blister-causing friction and has an antimicrobial treatment to deter odor development. Proprietary material at heels and forefeet absorbs shock and impact to provide comfort and cushioning. Molded polyurethane cradle supplies arch support and deep heel cupping for increased stability. Designed for use in tighter-fitting athletic, running or walking shoes with removable insoles. It is recommended to hand wash the Spenco PolySorb ProForm replacement insoles in warm water and air dry.
short_description: Spenco PolySorb ProForm replacement insoles deliver thin, contoured and flexible support for increased shock absorption and heel strike protection underfoot.
